frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-escape-overview
frozen.shortDescription: Close the Overview with a single ESC press when searchbox is empty.
frozen.longDescription:
Close the Overview with a single ESC press when searchbox is empty.

The default gnome-shell behaviour is, during first ESC press, clean the searchbox, then second ESC press get back to Activities overview and then third ESC press will finally close the overview.
